results.title: Effects of the peripheral CB1 receptor antagonist JD5037 in mono: and polytherapy with the AMPK activator metformin in a monocrotaline-induced rat model of pulmonary hypertension
results.text_hl: There were 8 groups of animals: 1) CTR + veh, 2) CTR + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@, 3) CTR + JD, 4) CTR + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ + JD, 5) @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ + veh, 6) @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@, 7) @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ + JD and 8) @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ + JD.

results.title: Metformin prevents the development of monocrotaline-induced pulmonary hypertension by decreasing serum levels of big endothelin-1

results.title: Inhalable Nanoparticles/Microparticles of an AMPK and Nrf2 Activator for Targeted Pulmonary Drug Delivery as Dry Powder Inhalers
results.text_hl: Since mitochondrial @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ oxidation is inhibited in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ levels are increased in endothelial and smooth muscle cells, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been reported to have positive effects in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@.
